title: Mount Isa copper
creator_credit: Antonio Colacino, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Tells the story of the copper industry based at Mt Isa in Queensland. Introduces typical workers and a housewife living in the town of 14,000 people. Shows completion of refining at Stuart near Townsville of pure copper suited to electrical use. Commentary by Shan Benson.
creator_credit_for_label: Antonio Colacino, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
